title: Register and use Cattle Tracing System (CTS) Online

details.overview: Register with BCMS's online service to register cattle births and report cattle deaths and cattle movements online
details.more_information:
New users will need to [register.](https://myaccount.gateway.gov.uk/RegisterOrLogon.aspx?gwv=1.0&gwrealm=urn:DEFRA-SERVICES-PTL&gwtheme=WFABCMS&gwcategory=org&cks=1 "Register for the Government Gateway"){:rel="external"}

##Getting help
The Rural Payments Agency website has [CTS Online user guides.](http://rpa.defra.gov.uk/rpa/index.nsf/vContentByTaxonomy/BCMS**Publications%20and%20Guidance**CTS%20Online%20User%20Guides**?OpenDocument "CTS Online user guides"){:rel="external"}

You can also contact the British Cattle Movement Service (BCMS) Helpline.

$C
**BCMS Helpline** 

<ctsonline@bcms.rpa.gsi.gov.uk>   
0845 050 1234   
Monday to Friday, 8am to 5:30pm  
Saturday, 9am to 1pm

$C

##Cross compliance
These standards are part of [cross compliance.](http://rpa.defra.gov.uk/rpa/index.nsf/UIMenu/814240C66F10CAC8802570C7004248D4?Opendocument "Cross compliance (Rural Payments Agency)"){:rel="external"} You must meet them to get your farming subsidy under the [Single Payment Scheme](/single-payment-scheme-online "Manage your Single Payment Scheme online"). 


*[BCMS]: British Cattle Movement Service
*[CTS]: Cattle Tracing System
details.introduction: Register cattle births. Report cattle deaths and movements. See details of your herd and individual animals. Make sure your records match those on CTS Online.
